This is a Markdown document. Text can be ephasized in __bold__ or _italics.

Bullet lists use a dash:

- item one
- item two
    - sub element

Ordinal lists use a number with period

1. First
2. Second
    + sub-elements can be nested
    + and both styles used together


Code can be written `in-line like this` using back-ticks or in a block of text

```
Like this
```
